text:
Rockets are an awesome story, T-Wolves quietly lurking in Nick’s NBA Tiers | FIRST THINGS FIRST
Nick Wright unveils his latest NBA Tiers as we inch closer to the playoffs, with the Houston Rockets labeled as an awesome story and within the bottom half of the tiers and the Minnesota Timberwolves quietly lurking. #FirstThingsFirst #NBA #Timberwolves The all-new FOX Sports App, built for the modern sports fan: https://tinyurl.com/y4uouolb ► Breakfast Ball's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@BreakfastBallonFS1 ► First Things First’s YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@FirstThingsFirst ► SPEAK's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/SpeakOnFS1 ► The Facility's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@TheFacilityonFS1 ► All Facts No Brakes with Keyshawn Johnson YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@AllFactsPod About First Things First: Nick Wright, Chris Broussard, and Kevin Wildes team up...
